```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(psydata

liibrary(todyverse)

# select only years after 1990
development %>%
  filter(year > "1990")

# calculate the average life expectancy in Africa
development 
  filter(continent = "africa") %>% 
  summarise(average(life_expectancy))

ggplot(aes(year, lifeExp, color=continent)) +
  geom_jitter()
```
